Text:
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARGH !!!!!!

Scare Crow... I dont know if you are new on here .... but people come on here to download things so they can watch them... And you just told everyone what happened !!!!

 NEVER EVER EVER EVER post the result of ANYTHING on here please !!! 

TMDK1... Thank you so much for your hard work as always... I wish people would think before they write stuff on here !! 
I have been waiting for almost a month for my favorite track of the year and this numpty spoils it for everyone !
Ah thanks!  You ARE the man!  Thanks for the hard work to give us this
Scarecrow ..... PLEASE ...Do NOT give away the results!  I avoid everything that might give the game away and you go and spoil it!

tdmk1, thanks a bunch !

scare crow : posting spoilers is really, really bad style, utterly stupid, too .

1. Thanks TMDK1! :)

2. I think giffo5s' comment was OK and to the point.  I guess there should be a minimum age requirement around here to keep that kind of pointless bickering out. :P  Or at least some kind of bumping system so we could collectively kick out swearing idiots like Fetal19 and scare_crow, to keep comments clean.

Swearing and name calling belongs (at best) in the school yard.

Thanks again to TDMK1 ... your uploads are freekin awesome man ! keep up the good work please.

Thanks Vphantom.. i thought my post was cool too... i was seething so bad after waiting a month and reading the result that i wanted to scream all kinds of crap it scarecrow...but i help back and thought he might be new on here.
I guess my slip of "nupmty" in the last sentence brought out the Prick in him.... lol.
I havent missed a race in 30 years and i look forward to every one so badly.
 I moved to the states from Wales and this is the only way to get BBC coverage, as many people have found out ! 
So thanks again to all the up loaders and go fuck yourself Scarecrow..... oops..you beat me too it. Wanker !

I also just wanted to say.... I have been among the the people who have bitched and moaned at Fetal19 for his various comments.....
But lately he has been much better and saying thanks n shit without bitching about the qualiy of the upload.
Im giving him a chance.... keep it up Fetal !
LMAO !! what a fuck numpty !! hahahahah
